data.name: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Track List:


01. Nadel und Faden Orchesterversion (02:04)
02. Ein Herz für K-k-kinder (03:03)
03. Devils New Tambourine (02:51)
04. Wuugi-Boogie (02:52)
05. Spiel mir das Lied von der Trance (02:21)
06. Hu-hu...und so weiter (02:17)
07. Der Doktor empfängt sie jetzt (02:47)
08. Was mach ich hier Blues (03:01)
09. Melodien für Dämonen (01:49)
10. Nadel und Faden Radioversion (04:25)
11. Needle and Stitch (engl. Version) (04:24)

data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows Vista/7
  • Processor:2GHz (Single Core) or 1,8GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory:1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 3400 Series, Geforce 9400 Series with at least 256 MB VRAM
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows Vista/7/8
  • Processor:2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 4500 Series, Geforce 9400 GT or higher
  • Hard Drive:1100 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
